DOC.brief_summary: This study aim assess correlation interleukin-10 ( IL-10 ) -1082A/G polymorphism idiopathic recurrent miscarriage ( IRM ) Chinese Han . A total 100 woman IRM 100 control woman successful pregnancy include study . Then genotyping perform .
DOC.brief_title: Interleukin-10 Promoter-1082A/G Polymorphism Idiopathic Recurrent Miscarriage Risk
DOC.detailed_description: As common occurrence early pregnancy , IRM associate multiple cause , among disorder immune homeostasis fetus maternal immune system , maintain cytokine complex regulatory network , consider one potential etiological factor underlie IRM . The IL-10 polymorphism -1082A/G ( rs1800896 ) , locate promoter region IL-10 gene , report implicated abnormal expression IL-10 IRM study . However , report association IL-10 polymorphism -1082A/G IRM risk Chinese Han .
DOC.criteria: 1. woman three consecutive unexplained pregnancy loss 20th week ; 2 . Chinese Han Population ; 3 . Patients sign informed consent . 1 . Patients highrisk factor might relate recurrent miscarriage , include : ( 1 ) Parental karyotype abnormality : significant rearrangement ( e.g . balanced translocation mosaic ) consider abnormal . If either patient ( partner ) abnormal karyotype , consider parental karyotypic abnormality ; ( 2 ) Genital tract abnormality : Any congenital anatomical deformation genital tract consider abnormal ; intrauterine adhesion , endometriosis hydrosalpinx also consider abnormal ; ( 3 ) alloimmune disorder ; ( 4 ) Endocrine abnormality : prolactin ( PRL ) level > 25 ng/ml , testosterone level > 2.6 nmol/L , thyroidstimulating hormone level < 0.30 mU/L > 4.5 mU/L , free thyroxine ( FT4 ) level < 8.36 nmol/L > 29.6 nmol/L free triiodothyronine ( FT3 ) level < 1.84 nmol/L > 7.39 nmol/L . Glucose level > 126mg/dl ; ( 5 ) Autoimmune disorder : Any positive result Anticardiolipin antibody ( ACAIgG/IgM/IgA ) , antinuclear antibody ( ANAIgG ) , antiendometrium antibody ( AEAIgM ) , antiovary antibody ( AOAIgM ) , antisperm antibody ( ASAIgM ) , antithyroidin ( TGAb ) , antithyroid peroxidase antibody ( TPOAb ) and/or antichorionic gonadotropin hormone antibody ; ( 6 ) Hypercoagulation state : Ddimer level > 260 ng/ml , fibrin degradation product ( FDP ) level > 5 mg/L antibeta 2glycoprotein I ( antibeta 2GP1 ) level > 15 U/ml ; ( 7 ) Negative RH blood group ; ( 8 ) Abnormal semen routine result patient husband . 2 . Patients serious disease ; 3 . Patients administration contraceptive pill ; 4 . Patients participate randomized clinical research ; 5 . Patients could followedup long time poor compliance ; 6 . Patients factor would affect study result .
